name: Cookie Dozer - Thanksgiving
description:
HAPPY THANKSGIVING, COOKIE DOZER style!

GAME CENTER Achievements and Online Scoreboards!

Straight from your favorite arcade or fair park and onto your iPhone! Push holiday cookies and treats into your hands by dropping some from your jar and into the machine. Watch out though! Try not to push them off the sides and back into the river. Collect Thanksgiving turkeys, pumpkins, pies and more for special bonuses or even more cookies! It’s ok if your cookies run out, more will be flying out of the oven and into your jar very soon Keep checking back to complete your collection of holiday treats!

Game includes: 
-Delicious 3-D graphics 
-32 prizes to collect 
-Amazingly realistic physics
 -Over 30 cookies and treats! 
-Lots of special effects

More updates coming soon!
